label: AB2C4_oC28_64_a_d_ef-001
title: Gd$_{2}$CuO$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
This is a slight orthorhombic distortion of the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C4_tI14_139_a_e_cd-003}{Nd$_{2}$CuO$_{4}$ structure}, and there is some evidence that both Gd$_{2}$CuO$_{4}$ and Eu$_{2}$CuO$_{4}$ transform to the Nd$_{2}$CuO$_{4}$ structure at higher temperatures. 
 We did not find an ICSD from (Luo, 1999), so we use the one from the earlier work of (Braden, 1994).
